revision.text:
[[File:FarmPoint.png|thumb|200px|A Farm Point]]
==Use==
Can be traded for [[Masterball]] at the Pokemon Leagues, or for [[Farm Items]] at the [[Berry Master]]s. Gained from harvesting berries (withering does not grant farm tokens). Also used for 1-time purchases and upgrades of the [[Squirtbottle]] and [[Sprinklotad]] [[Oak Items]].
==Details== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Berry !!
